column2:
Notes : 1. Data for 2018-19 are Third Revised Estimates,for 2019-20 are Second Revised Estimates and 
                 for 2020-21 are First Revised Estimates.
             2. Data for 2021-22 are Provisional Estimates.
             3. Population figures relates to mid-financial year.
             4. For the years prior to 2004-05, the additivity of detailed estimates with the aggregates will not be maintained since estimates for that period at detailed and aggregate levels have been compiled by adopting 
                  the splicing method. 


Source : National Statistical Office (NSO).
